name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DirectStayz: Book hotels directly, save money and unlock benefits

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book hotels directly when browsing booking.com, save up to 30% on fees, and unlock exclusive perks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you know that up to 30% of your booking cost on Online Travel Agencies (OTAs) like Booking.com goes to middleman fees?

üü£ Use DirectStayz to book hotels directly when browsing booking. com, save up to 30% on fees, and unlock exclusive perks.

üöÄ Why Book Directly?
- Best Prices Guaranteed: Hotels often save on commission fees when you book directly, passing those savings on to you. 
- Exclusive Perks: Enjoy free upgrades, late checkout, complimentary meals, and other perks not available on third-party sites.
- Personalized Service: Communicate your preferences directly with the hotel, ensuring a more tailored and stress-free booking experience.

üåü How DirectStayz Works:
1. Add to Chrome: Install the DirectStayz extension and browse Booking.com as usual.
2. Book Smarter: When you find a hotel, click "Reserve directly at [hotel website]" next to the original booking.com's "I'll reserve" button.
3. Save and Enjoy: Experience the benefits of booking directly‚Äîlower prices, exclusive perks, and more!

üí° Key Features:
- Direct Connection: No middlemen‚Äîbook directly with hotels for the best deals and offers.
- Effortless Savings: Automatically find and apply direct booking options while you browse.
- Exclusive Perks: Unlock upgrades, late checkouts, and more by booking direct.

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions
How much can I save?
By booking directly through hotels, you can save up to 30% on fees typically charged by OTAs like Booking.com, Agoda, and Expedia.

What benefits can I expect?
Booking direct often means lower prices, free upgrades, late checkouts, complimentary spa access, meal upgrades, and more.

Is it safe?
Absolutely. Booking directly through hotel websites ensures secure transactions and gives you more control over your reservations.

How does DirectStayz make money?
DirectStayz is free for users. We earn a small commission from our affiliate partners when you book through DirectStayz. This doesn't affect your booking price.

Contact Us:
Have questions? Reach out to us at üíå matcha.squad1@gmail.com

Book Direct. Save More. Experience Better with DirectStayz.
